vote.text: Amendment SA 1224 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 1224 proposed by Senator Reid for Senator DeMint. (consideration: CR S5883; text: CR S5883) To amend the preamble.

Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1224 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
